location.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾新北市淡水区
location.en: Tamsui District, New Taipei City, Taiwan, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 位于新北市淡水区的私立综合大学。前身为1950年由居正、邹鲁、张鸣与张建邦共同创办的“淡江英语专科学校”，1958年改为“淡江文理学院”，1980年升格为大学。现有淡水、台北、兰阳三大校园。
description.en: A private comprehensive university located in Tamsui District, New Taipei City. It was founded in 1950 by Ju Zheng, Zou Lu, Zhang Ming, and Chang Chien-pang as 'Tamkang English Junior College', renamed 'Tamkang College of Arts and Sciences' in 1958, and elevated to university status in 1980. It currently has three campuses: Tamsui, Taipei, and Lanyang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，淡江英语专科学校共同创办人及首任董事长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, co-founder and first chairman of Tamkang English Junior College.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学共同创办人。
description.en: Co-founder of Tamkang University.

description.zh-cn: 淡江英语专科学校共同创办人及首任校长。
description.en: Co-founder and first president of Tamkang English Junior College.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学共同创办人，曾任校长与董事长。
description.en: Co-founder of Tamkang University, served as president and chairman.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学共同创办人居正的妻子，曾任淡江英语专科学校董事长。
description.en: Wife of Tamkang University co-founder Ju Zheng, served as chairwoman of Tamkang English Junior College.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学创办人居正之女，张鸣之妻。曾任淡江英语专科学校及淡江文理学院董事长与校长。
description.en: Daughter of Tamkang University founder Ju Zheng and wife of Zhang Ming. She served as chairwoman and president of Tamkang English Junior College and Tamkang College of Arts and Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 曾任淡江文理学院及淡江大学董事长。
description.en: Served as chairman of Tamkang College of Arts and Sciences and Tamkang University.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学创办人张建邦的妻子，曾任淡江大学董事长。
description.en: Wife of Tamkang University co-founder Chang Chien-pang, served as chairwoman of Tamkang University.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学创办人张建邦的次女，曾任淡江大学董事长。
description.en: The second daughter of Tamkang University co-founder Chang Chien-pang, served as chairwoman of Tamkang University.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学创办人张建邦的长女，曾任淡江大学校长，现任董事长。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Tamkang University co-founder Chang Chien-pang, served as president and is the current chairwoman of Tamkang University.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学创办人居正的次子，曾任淡江英语专科学校校长。
description.en: The second son of Tamkang University co-founder Ju Zheng, served as president of Tamkang English Junior College.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学资讯工程学系教授，现任淡江大学校长。
description.en: Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering at Tamkang University, and the current president of the university.

description.zh-cn: 台湾知名水彩画家，设计了淡江大学的校徽。
description.en: A renowned Taiwanese watercolor artist who designed the emblem of Tamkang University.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学管理科学研究所毕业校友，曾捐款兴建守谦国际会议中心及成立奖学金。
description.en: An alumnus of the Graduate Institute of Management Sciences at Tamkang University, who donated funds for the construction of the Hsu Shou-Chlien International Conference Center and the establishment of scholarships.

description.zh-cn: 台湾校园民歌运动的催生者之一，淡江大学数学系校友。校内设有其纪念碑。
description.en: One of the pioneers of the Taiwanese campus folk song movement and an alumnus of the Department of Mathematics at Tamkang University. A monument in his memory is located on campus.

description.zh-cn: 台湾雕塑家，为淡江大学创作了李双泽纪念碑、海豚吉祥物里程碑及五虎碑等多件雕塑作品。
description.en: A Taiwanese sculptor who created several sculptures for Tamkang University, including the Li Shuang-ze Memorial, the Dolphin Mascot Milestone, and the Five Tigers Monument.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家、诗人、画家与艺术评论家，为淡江大学李双泽纪念碑题字。
description.en: A Taiwanese writer, poet, painter, and art critic who wrote the inscription for the Li Shuang-ze Memorial at Tamkang University.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的私立大学交流联盟，淡江大学为其成员之一。
description.en: An alliance for academic exchange among private universities in Taiwan, of which Tamkang University is a member.

description.zh-cn: 由七所台湾大专院校合组的研究中心，淡江大学为其成员之一。
description.en: A research center formed by a consortium of seven Taiwanese universities, of which Tamkang University is a member.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的大学学术联盟，淡江大学为其成员之一。
description.en: An academic alliance of universities in Taiwan, of which Tamkang University is a member.

description.zh-cn: 跨国大学联盟，淡江大学为其成员之一。
description.en: A transnational university alliance, of which Tamkang University is a member.

description.zh-cn: 总部位于联合国教科文组织的全球性高等教育协会，淡江大学为其成员。
description.en: A global association of higher education institutions based at UNESCO, of which Tamkang University is a member.

description.zh-cn: 于2017年在台北市举办的国际综合性体育赛事。
description.en: An international multi-sport event held in Taipei in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 来自中华人民共和国的留学生，曾参选淡江大学学生会会长，引发争议。
description.en: An exchange student from the People's Republic of China who ran for the presidency of the Tamkang University Student Association, causing controversy.

nodes.id: 2014年淡江大学学生会正副会长补选争议

zh-cn: 2014年淡江大学学生会正副会长补选争议

description.zh-cn: 指2014年因中国大陆籍留学生蔡博艺参选淡江大学学生会会长而引发的一系列争议事件。
description.en: Refers to a series of controversial events in 2014 arising from the candidacy of mainland Chinese student Cai Boyi for the presidency of the Tamkang University Student Association.

description.zh-cn: 居正与邹鲁、张鸣、张建邦等人于1950年共同创办淡江英语专科学校（淡江大学前身）。
description.en: Ju Zheng, along with Zou Lu, Zhang Ming, and Chang Chien-pang, co-founded Tamkang English Junior College (the predecessor of Tamkang University) in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 作为居正的夫人（“居正伉俪”），居钟明志被认为是淡江大学的共同创办人之一。
description.en: As the wife of Ju Zheng ('Ju Zheng and his wife'), Ju Zhongmingzhi is considered one of the co-founders of Tamkang University.

description.zh-cn: 邹鲁与居正、张鸣、张建邦等人于1950年共同创办淡江英语专科学校（淡江大学前身）。
description.en: Zou Lu, along with Ju Zheng, Zhang Ming, and Chang Chien-pang, co-founded Tamkang English Junior College (the predecessor of Tamkang University) in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 张鸣与其子张建邦，及居正、邹鲁等人于1950年共同创办淡江英语专科学校（淡江大学前身）。
description.en: Zhang Ming and his son Chang Chien-pang, along with Ju Zheng and Zou Lu, co-founded Tamkang English Junior College (the predecessor of Tamkang University) in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 张建邦与其父张鸣，及居正、邹鲁等人于1950年共同创办淡江英语专科学校（淡江大学前身）。
description.en: Chang Chien-pang and his father Zhang Ming, along with Ju Zheng and Zou Lu, co-founded Tamkang English Junior College (the predecessor of Tamkang University) in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 设计了淡江大学的校徽。
description.en: Designed the emblem of Tamkang University.

degree.en: Master, Graduate Institute of Management Sciences

description.zh-cn: 捐款兴建守谦国际会议中心（2017年启用）及成立“有莲奖学金”（2020年）。
description.en: Donated funds for the construction of the Hsu Shou-Chlien International Conference Center (opened in 2017) and the establishment of the 'Yu-Lien Scholarship' (2020).

description.zh-cn: 为纪念校友李双泽，在校园内设立了纪念碑，以表彰其对台湾校园民歌运动的贡献。
description.en: To commemorate alumnus Li Shuang-ze, the university erected a memorial on campus to recognize his contributions to the Taiwanese campus folk song movement.

description.zh-cn: 为淡江大学设计并创作了李双泽纪念碑、海豚吉祥物里程碑和五虎碑雕塑。
description.en: Designed and created the Li Shuang-ze Memorial, the Dolphin Mascot Milestone, and the Five Tigers Monument sculpture for Tamkang University.

description.zh-cn: 为淡江大学校园内的李双泽纪念碑题写碑文。
description.en: Wrote the inscription for the Li Shuang-ze Memorial on the Tamkang University campus.

description.zh-cn: 淡江大学的绍谟纪念体育馆被用作2017年夏季世界大学运动会举重比赛的主场馆。
description.en: The Shao-Mo Memorial Gymnasium at Tamkang University served as the main venue for the weightlifting events of the 2017 Summer Universiade.

relationships.source: 2014年淡江大学学生会正副会长补选争议

description.zh-cn: 蔡博艺作为中国大陆籍学生参选淡江大学学生会会长，其身份与参选资格引发了激烈的校内外讨论和争议。
description.en: As a mainland Chinese student running for the presidency of the Tamkang University Student Association, Cai Boyi's identity and eligibility sparked intense discussions and controversies both on and off campus.
